column4: I just screwed up my /bin/mount and /bin/umount commands, can someone tell me what chmod number will return the original ownership to it... Is it 755?
I hate when stuff like that happens .... It puts a blanket of funk over the whole system :) Even if you restore it, it doesn't feel the same afterwards :)
yeah this sucks i cant mount anything now i chmod'ed it 777 and now its f-ed, do you know what command i should use to fix it?
Sorry ... try to google it, there is quite extensive lists somewhere on the interweb
